description:
Prepare for an epic tower defense showdown as you defend your planet against waves of incoming robot invaders! Strategically place powerful turrets armed with lasers, plasma balls, rockets, and more along the pathway connecting your planet to the enemy's.

Lead an army of diverse robots, each with its specialized weaponry and tactics. From sleek drones to hulking tanks and towering walkers, every unit brings a unique edge to the battlefield. Unleash laser-guided rockets, and beware colossal big bosses armed with plasma cannons. The fate of your planet hangs in the balance as you repel the metallic invaders and secure victory.

Across multiple stages featuring diverse planets and formidable robot races, the challenge intensifies. Quick reflexes and cunning strategy will be your greatest assets as you fend off increasingly formidable waves of invaders and unleash devastating attacks on the enemy world.

Enhance your defenses by upgrading turrets, unlocking new and more powerful options to repel the robotic threat. With vibrant graphics, addictive gameplay, and a cast of charming characters, this captivating tower defence game promises hours of entertainment for players of all ages. Get ready to defend your planet and launch an epic counter-offensive against the metallic threat!

Features
• Place turrets
• Deploy robot defenders
• Epic battles
• Three levels of difficulty
• Full controller support
• Touch Support
name: Cosmic Robots
